<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List standard object schemas</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/metadata/standard_objects"}></MethodEndpoint>



List standard object schemas

Support:

| Provider    | Supported |
| ----------- | --------- |
| Hubspot     | Yes       |
| Salesforce  | Yes       | 
| Pipedrive   | No        |
| MS Dynamics | No        |
